name: Kedar Malwadkar Software Technical Lead Mobile
designation: Technical Lead        from: 09/12/2019 to Today Teamware Solutions (Client - Credit Suisse) Working for Credit Suisse in house Risk Management software. Design and development of new features for Exposure calculations in Investment banking. Working on cloud deployment of the product to help reduce the hardware requirements of the product. Software Engineering Team Lead (Focus Master)    from: 01/10/2014 to: 06/12/2019 Amdocs India Leading a team of around 6 members for Turbo Charging Product. Team expertise is across C++ and Java language. Managing core (Layer 3) support for 5 APAC clients. Lead the team in production upgrade for 3 APAC accounts Successfully developed, managed and delivered 5 major and multiple small enhancements to the product. Enhancement highlights: Real Time Notification - Ability to send OCS notifications in real time to a web-service on SOAP/REST interface. Light Ordering - Ability to handle high volumes of allowance Add-On offers using Ordering lite process integrating with OCS.  Update Handler Split - splitting UH functionality for extract and load to handle single CM; multiple OCS site setup. Automatic Structure Validation
